Text: This Email is sent at the request of M Kahn and J DeBerrymade the following annotations on NEW EMAIL ADDRESSES AT PAUL HASTINGS JANOFSKY WALKER LLP We have changed our email address Our new domain name is paulhastingscom In most cases our address is composed of conventional first name and last name plus paulhastingscom Here are two examples and If you have any questions please contact us at The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from all computers Attached is a revised draft of the LLC Agreement which has been marked to indicate the changes from the draft distributed on Friday April As we discussed the most substantive change made to the LLC Agreement reflects NorthWesterns desire to have the LLC treated as a single member limited liability company for tax purposes While Enrons tax persons have not yet agreed to this concept we have forwarded the attached draft in order to clarify our request and to provide Enrons tax persons with the language we believe is necessary to meet NorthWesterns objectives with respect to this matter You will note that a significant number of provisions regarding tax matters have been deleted Such provisions have been deleted because to the extent the LLC is treated as a single member limited liability company such provisions would no longer be relevant A revised draft of the Letter Agreement will be circulated shortly LLC AgreementvDOC LLC AgreementvREDDOC
